name: swaps
description: Indexer for Solana swaps. Supports Orca and Raydium

PORTAL_URL.description: The URL of the portal to index

FROM_BLOCK.description: The block number to start indexing from

TO_BLOCK.description: The block number to stop indexing at

CLICKHOUSE_URL.description: The URL of the Clickhouse database

CLICKHOUSE_DATABASE.description: The name of the Clickhouse database

CLICKHOUSE_USERNAME.description: The username for the Clickhouse database

CLICKHOUSE_PASSWORD.description: The password for the Clickhouse database
